item.title: [Python] Insert ROS melodic into Raspberry Pi 4/Buster
item.description: ![SS 192.png](https://qiita-image-store.s3.ap-northeast-1.amazonaws.com/0/565043/a41cd967-f549-8677-1efa-2e99bf69518d.png) First post on Qiita To do. I'm Ninagawa_Izumi. Hope it helps. ##things to do Let’s make ROS melodic work with Raster Pi 4 Buster. While referring to various places, I tried to write it in a way that is OK if you continue to type shell commands. I’m sure anyone can introduce the latest ROS environment as of January 2020. What is ROS? An open source platform aimed at promoting joint development of robot software on a global scale.
